title: There Is Power In The Blood
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c

v1: Would you be free from your burden of sin?
There's pow'r in the blood, pow'r in the blood;
Would you o'er evil a victory win?
There's wonderful pow'r in the blood.
v2: Would you be free from your passion and pride?
There's pow'r in the blood, pow'r in the blood;
Come for a cleansing to Calvary's tide,
There's wonderful pow'r in the blood.
v3: Would you be whiter, much whiter than snow?
There's pow'r in the blood, pow'r in the blood;
Sin-stains are lost in its life-giving flow,
There's wonderful pow'r in the blood.
v4: Would you do service for Jesus your King?
There's pow'r in the blood, pow'r in the blood;
Would you live daily His praises to sing?
There's wonderful pow'r in the blood.
c1: There is pow'r, pow'r, wonderworking pow'r,
In the blood of the Lamb;
There is pow'r, pow'r, wonderworking pow'r,
In the precious blood of the Lamb.
